title: Kaalangathale Lyrics Venghai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Karthik
Song: Kaalangathale 
Lyrics: Viveka
Music : Devi Sri Prasad
Movie :Venghai


Kaalangathale, maranjirukum vennila pola
Enna pathale, Olinjikiruye ..penne..hmm hmm .. hmm hmm.
Kaalangathale, maranjirukum vennila pola
Enna pathale, Olinjikiruye ..penne..
Pozhuthu sanjaale, thala kuniyum thaamarai pola
Enna pathale, vetakapaduriye..penne

Unnai nan parthen, nan rasithen, nan thindadinen,
Unnai nan thodardhen, nan unnardhen, nan kadhal kondaen,
En vazhkayin vasale neeye thaanadi ..oh oh.. oh.
Kaalangathale, maranjirukum vennila pola
Enna pathale, Olinjikiruye ..penne..
Pozhuthu sanjaale, thala kuniyum thaamarai pola
Enna pathale, vetakapaduriye..penne

Uthattai sulithu sirukum pozhudhu, 
Uyiril vedi vaikirai ...
Ovvoru varthai mudiyum pozhudhum
etharku podi vaikirai ..
Kollu bommai pol irukirai,
nee kodi mullai pol nadakiraai
Adikadi nagam kadikirai, ennai Mayaki mayam seithai
Nan rathiri pathidum vanavil neee.. ohhhhoooh..oh

Kaalangathale, maranjirukum vennila pola ...

Palasai maraka, nenaikum unnaku nadika varavillaye
Oouvam marandhu, puruvam viriya siruvan nanillaye
Etharku nee ennai thavirkiraai,
En ethirile mugam sivakirai,
Agamellam poi poosiye ennai arugil serka maruthaai
En aaviyai thaangidum en theeye neeyadi..ohhhhoooh..oh

Kaalangathale, maranjirukum vennila pola
Enna pathale, Olinjikiruye ..penne..
Pozhuthu sanjaale, thala kuniyum thaamarai pola
Enna pathale, vetakapaduriye..penne
